metadata.title: CVE-2016-0724 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The (1) core_enrol_get_course_enrolment_methods and (2)enrol_self_get_instance_info web services in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.xbefore 2.7.12, 2.8.x before 2.8.10, 2.9.x before 2.9.4, and 3.0.x before3.0.2 do not consider the moodle/course:viewhiddencourses capability, whichallows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via aweb-service request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0724` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.12+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.12+dfsg-1').
